title: Set $$f(x)=0$$
text: To find the x-intercept, let $$f(x)=0$$ and and solve for $$x$$.

title: Solve For The Parabola
text: Solve for $$x^2+10x-11=0$$. We can factor it as $$\left(x+11\right) \left(x-1\right)$$.
speech: Solve for  x squared plus 10 x minus 11 is equal to 0 . We can factor it as  parentheses x plus 11,  times, parentheses x minus 1,  .

title: Solve For The Parabola
text: $$\left(x+11\right) \left(x-1\right)=0$$\nUse zero product property, we know $$x+11=0$$ or $$x-1=0$$ which gives the answer $$x=-11$$ or $$x=1$$.

title: Put The Answer Into (x,y)
text: We know that $$y=0$$ in x-intercepts and we get $$x=-11$$, $$1$$ through the calculations above. Put together, we get two x-intercepts-- $$(-11,0)$$ and $$(1,0)$$.
